shortdesc.ph: Information about externally encoded video frames.
Information about externally encoded video frames.
Information about externally encoded video frames.
Information about external encoded video frames.

plentry.pd: Video codec type. See . Default value is VideoCodecH264 (2).
Width of the video frame (px).
Height of the video frame (px).
Number of video frames per second. When this parameter is not 0, you can use it to calculate the Unix timestamp of the externally encoded video frame.
Type of the video frame. See .
Rotation information of the video frame. See .
Reserved parameter.
Unix timestamp (ms) when the externally encoded video frame was captured.
Type of video stream. See .
